body:
As some of you might know, I recently got Moderator rank. I would like for the community to get to know me more so ask me anything, just keep it appropriate.

Harry
body_tagged:
As some of you might know, I recently got Moderator rank. I would like for the community to get to know me more so ask me anything, just keep it appropriate.

Harry
title: AMA <3

replies.body:
Hey Harry, Congratulations on Moderator and you have done a good job so far in the position.

Do you love Moderating so far?
What does it consist of doing?
Am I your favorite?

Babe <3

replies.body: How well do you think you're going as a Mod?
replies.body_tagged: How well do you think you're going as a Mod?

replies.body:
@Eteh

Chill guy, nice to talk to and friendly.

Kangaroo (It actually tastes really good)

I love getting more involved with the community and punishing the rule breakers >:D

@X0X0

Don't really know you sorry, but seem like a nice lady and you have a good sense of humour.

Of course.

@Blaze

Nice guy, see you in game a lot and you're a good rusher :)

Kangaroo, Red, Wombats and Frozen McSpider.

@Emily

Used to talk a lot, really nice, easy to talk to and miss you <3

@Pizza

Halcyon

I drink Coffee

Scone with jam and whipped cream.

Never tried a Jaffa cake.

Yes, I love crumpets.

@Snow

I personally think I could improve on a few parts, which I'll try my hardest to improve on :)
